scripts.clean: npx rimraf dist && npx rimraf src/OVE.Service.NetworkTiles/bin && npx rimraf src/OVE.Service.NetworkTiles/obj
scripts.build: dotnet restore src/OVE.Service.NetworkTiles && dotnet build src/OVE.Service.NetworkTiles && dotnet publish src/OVE.Service.NetworkTiles -o ../../dist
scripts.build:alpine: dotnet restore src/OVE.Service.NetworkTiles && dotnet build src/OVE.Service.NetworkTiles && dotnet publish src/OVE.Service.NetworkTiles -o ../../dist --runtime alpine.3.7-x64
